Reviews.Title: “This was a great hotel for the price.”
Reviews.Author: meljel
Reviews.Content: chose hotel price excellent 60 euro double location hotel clean hallway looked little grubby ate restaurant food healthy expensive waiter extremely nice staff pleasant helpful leave luggage day check prefered bathroom products available shampoo bottle 2 people definitely consider hotel
